original_title: State Ministers to oversee ministries under President during his visit to India
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe has appointed several State Ministers to oversee the ministries that are under the head of state, during his official two-day visit to India.
President Wickremesinghe will leave for India on Thursday (20) evening.
State Minister Pramitha Bandara Tennakoon will serve as the Minister of Defence.
State Minister Shehan Semasinghe will serve as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policy.
State Minister Dilum Amunugama will serve as the Minister of Investment Promotion.
State Minister Kanaka Herath will serve as the Minister of Technology.
State Minister Anupa Pasqual will serve as the Minister of Women, Children Affairs, & Social Empowerment.
